item.title: How to host Restful API with MariaDB on Raspberry Pi using docker image, express.js and Ngrok
item.description: In this guide, we’ll explore how to host a RESTful API with MariaDB 10 on a Raspberry Pi using Docker, Express.

item.title: Getting Started with Entity Framework Core in Visual Studio
item.description: Entity Framework Core is a powerful tool for simplifying database integration with web applications.
